attributes.action: Turn off the heating in the Houses of Parliament for a month to let MPs experience what their voters are doing
attributes.additional_details: I think that the heating should be turned off in the Houses of Parliament so that the MPs can experience the same as their voters.We are all in it together and we have to be fair and do the right thing.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House of Commons Commission who has authority for such matters in the House.  This is not a matter for Government.
